annotation.title: NISAR L1 RSLC Product
annotation.reference_document: D-102268 NISAR NASA SDS Product Specification Level-1 Range Doppler Single Look Complex L1_RSLC

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/missionId
string.annotation: Mission identifier

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/processingCenter
string.annotation: Data processing center

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/productType
string.annotation: Product type

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/granuleId
string.annotation: Unique granule identification name

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/productVersion
string.annotation: Product version which represents the structure of the product and the science content governed by the algorithm, input data, and processing parameters

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/productSpecificationVersion
string.annotation: Product specification version which represents the schema of this product

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/lookDirection
string.annotation: Look direction, either "Left" or "Right"

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/orbitPassDirection
string.annotation: Orbit direction, either "Ascending" or "Descending"

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/zeroDopplerStartTime
string.annotation: Azimuth start time of the product

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/zeroDopplerEndTime
string.annotation: Azimuth stop time of the product

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/plannedDatatakeId
string.annotation: List of planned datatakes included in the product

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/plannedObservationId
string.annotation: List of planned observations included in the product

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/isUrgentObservation
string.annotation: Flag indicating if observation is nominal ("False") or urgent ("True")

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/listOfFrequencies
string.annotation: List of frequency layers available in the product

integer.name: /science/LSAR/identification/diagnosticModeFlag
integer.annotation: Indicates if the radar operation mode is a diagnostic mode (1-2) or DBFed science (0): 0, 1, or 2

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/productLevel
string.annotation: Product level. L0A: Unprocessed instrument data; L0B: Reformatted, unprocessed instrument data; L1: Processed instrument data in radar coordinates system; and L2: Processed instrument data in geocoded coordinates system

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/isGeocoded
string.annotation: Flag to indicate if the product data is in the radar geometry ("False") or in the map geometry ("True")

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/boundingPolygon
string.annotation: OGR compatible WKT representation of bounding polygon of the image

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/processingDateTime
string.annotation: Processing UTC date and time in the format YYYY-mm-ddTHH:MM:SS

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/radarBand
string.annotation: Acquired frequency band, either "L" or "S"

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/instrumentName
string.annotation: Name of the instrument used to collect the remote sensing data provided in this product

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/processingType
string.annotation: Nominal (or) Urgent (or) Custom (or) Undefined

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/isDithered
string.annotation: "True" if the pulse timing was varied (dithered) during acquisition, "False" otherwise.

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/isMixedMode
string.annotation: "True" if this product is a composite of data collected in multiple radar modes, "False" otherwise.

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/swaths/zeroDopplerTime
real.annotation: CF compliant dimension associated with azimuth time

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/swaths/zeroDopplerTimeSpacing
real.annotation: Time interval in the along-track direction for raster layers. This is same as the spacing between consecutive entries in the zeroDopplerTime array

string.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/swaths/frequencyA/listOfPolarizations
string.annotation: List of processed polarization layers with frequency A

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/swaths/frequencyA/sceneCenterAlongTrackSpacing
real.annotation: Nominal along-track spacing in meters between consecutive lines near mid swath of the RSLC image

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/swaths/frequencyA/sceneCenterGroundRangeSpacing
real.annotation: Nominal ground range spacing in meters between consecutive pixels near mid swath of the RSLC image

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/swaths/frequencyA/processedRangeBandwidth
real.annotation: Processed range bandwidth in hertz

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/swaths/frequencyA/acquiredRangeBandwidth
real.annotation: Acquisition range bandwidth in hertz. In case of mode combination, this corresponds to mode with largest bandwidth.

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/swaths/frequencyA/processedAzimuthBandwidth
real.annotation: Processed azimuth bandwidth in hertz

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/swaths/frequencyA/nominalAcquisitionPRF
real.annotation: Nominal PRF of acquisition. In case of mode combination, this corresponds to mode with least nominal PRF.

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/swaths/frequencyA/processedCenterFrequency
real.annotation: Center frequency of the processed image in hertz

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/swaths/frequencyA/acquiredCenterFrequency
real.annotation: Center frequency of the acquisition in hertz. In case of mode combination, this corresponds to the mode with highest center frequency.

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/swaths/frequencyA/slantRangeSpacing
real.annotation: Slant range spacing of grid. Same as difference between consecutive samples in slantRange array

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/swaths/frequencyA/slantRange
real.annotation: CF compliant dimension associated with slant range

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/swaths/frequencyA/HH
real.annotation: Focused RSLC image (HH)

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/swaths/frequencyA/HV
real.annotation: Focused RSLC image (HV)

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/swaths/frequencyA/VH
real.annotation: Focused RSLC image (VH)

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/swaths/frequencyA/VV
real.annotation: Focused RSLC image (VV)

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/swaths/frequencyA/RH
real.annotation: Focused RSLC image (RH)

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/swaths/frequencyA/RV
real.annotation: Focused RSLC image (RV)

integer.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/swaths/frequencyA/numberOfSubSwaths
integer.annotation: Number of swaths of continuous imagery, due to transmit gaps

integer.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/swaths/frequencyA/validSamplesSubSwath1
integer.annotation: First and last valid sample in each line of 1st subswath

integer.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/swaths/frequencyA/validSamplesSubSwath2
integer.annotation: First and last valid sample in each line of 2nd subswath

integer.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/swaths/frequencyA/validSamplesSubSwath3
integer.annotation: First and last valid sample in each line of 3rd subswath

integer.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/swaths/frequencyA/validSamplesSubSwath4
integer.annotation: First and last valid sample in each line of 4th subswath

integer.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/swaths/frequencyA/validSamplesSubSwath5
integer.annotation: First and last valid sample in each line of 5th subswath

string.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/swaths/frequencyB/listOfPolarizations
string.annotation: List of processed polarization layers with frequency B

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/swaths/frequencyB/sceneCenterAlongTrackSpacing
real.annotation: Nominal along-track spacing in meters between consecutive lines near mid swath of the RSLC image

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/swaths/frequencyB/sceneCenterGroundRangeSpacing
real.annotation: Nominal ground range spacing in meters between consecutive pixels near mid swath of the RSLC image

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/swaths/frequencyB/processedRangeBandwidth
real.annotation: Processed range bandwidth in hertz

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/swaths/frequencyB/acquiredRangeBandwidth
real.annotation: Acquisition range bandwidth in hertz. In case of mode combination, this corresponds to mode with largest bandwidth.

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/swaths/frequencyB/processedAzimuthBandwidth
real.annotation: Processed azimuth bandwidth in hertz

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/swaths/frequencyB/nominalAcquisitionPRF
real.annotation: Nominal PRF of acquisition. In case of mode combination, this corresponds to mode with least nominal PRF.

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/swaths/frequencyB/processedCenterFrequency
real.annotation: Center frequency of the processed image in hertz

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/swaths/frequencyB/acquiredCenterFrequency
real.annotation: Center frequency of the acquisition in hertz. In case of mode combination, this corresponds to the mode with highest center frequency.

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/swaths/frequencyB/slantRangeSpacing
real.annotation: Slant range spacing of grid. Same as difference between consecutive samples in slantRange array

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/swaths/frequencyB/slantRange
real.annotation: CF compliant dimension associated with slant range

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/swaths/frequencyB/HH
real.annotation: Focused RSLC image (HH)

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/swaths/frequencyB/HV
real.annotation: Focused RSLC image (HV)

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/swaths/frequencyB/VH
real.annotation: Focused RSLC image (VH)

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/swaths/frequencyB/VV
real.annotation: Focused RSLC image (VV)

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/swaths/frequencyB/RH
real.annotation: Focused RSLC image (RH)

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/swaths/frequencyB/RV
real.annotation: Focused RSLC image (RV)

integer.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/swaths/frequencyB/numberOfSubSwaths
integer.annotation: Number of swaths of continuous imagery, due to transmit gaps

integer.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/swaths/frequencyB/validSamplesSubSwath1
integer.annotation: First and last valid sample in each line of 1st subswath

integer.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/swaths/frequencyB/validSamplesSubSwath2
integer.annotation: First and last valid sample in each line of 2nd subswath

integer.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/swaths/frequencyB/validSamplesSubSwath3
integer.annotation: First and last valid sample in each line of 3rd subswath

integer.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/swaths/frequencyB/validSamplesSubSwath4
integer.annotation: First and last valid sample in each line of 4th subswath

integer.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/swaths/frequencyB/validSamplesSubSwath5
integer.annotation: First and last valid sample in each line of 5th subswath

integer.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/geolocationGrid/epsg
integer.annotation: EPSG code corresponding to coordinate system used for representing geolocation grid

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/geolocationGrid/coordinateY
real.annotation: Y coordinates in specified EPSG code

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/geolocationGrid/coordinateX
real.annotation: X coordinates in specified EPSG code

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/geolocationGrid/incidenceAngle
real.annotation: Incidence angle is defined as the angle between the LOS vector and the normal to the ellipsoid at the target height

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/geolocationGrid/losUnitVectorX
real.annotation: East component of unit vector of LOS from target to sensor

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/geolocationGrid/losUnitVectorY
real.annotation: North component of unit vector of LOS from target to sensor

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/geolocationGrid/alongTrackUnitVectorX
real.annotation: East component of unit vector along ground track

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/geolocationGrid/alongTrackUnitVectorY
real.annotation: North component of unit vector along ground track

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/geolocationGrid/elevationAngle
real.annotation: Elevation angle is defined as the angle between the LOS vector and the normal to the ellipsoid at the sensor

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/geolocationGrid/slantRange
real.annotation: Slant range values corresponding to the geolocation grid

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/geolocationGrid/zeroDopplerTime
real.annotation: Zero Doppler time values corresponding to the geolocation grid

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/geolocationGrid/groundTrackVelocity
real.annotation: Absolute value of the platform velocity scaled at the target height

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/geolocationGrid/heightAboveEllipsoid
real.annotation: Height values above WGS84 Ellipsoid corresponding to the location grid

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/geometry/zeroDopplerTime
real.annotation: Zero doppler time dimension corresponding to calibration records

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/geometry/slantRange
real.annotation: Slant range dimension corresponding to calibration records

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/geometry/beta0
real.annotation: 2D LUT to convert DN to beta 0 assuming as a function of zero doppler time and slant range

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/geometry/sigma0
real.annotation: 2D LUT to convert DN to sigma 0 assuming as a function of zero doppler time and slant range

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/geometry/gamma0
real.annotation: 2D LUT to convert DN to gamma 0 as a function of zero doppler time and slant range

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyA/elevationAntennaPattern/zeroDopplerTime
real.annotation: Zero doppler time dimension corresponding to calibration elevationAntennaPattern records

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyA/elevationAntennaPattern/slantRange
real.annotation: Slant range dimension corresponding to calibration elevationAntennaPattern records

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyA/elevationAntennaPattern/HH
real.annotation: Complex two-way elevation antenna pattern

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyA/elevationAntennaPattern/HV
real.annotation: Complex two-way elevation antenna pattern

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyA/elevationAntennaPattern/VH
real.annotation: Complex two-way elevation antenna pattern

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyA/elevationAntennaPattern/VV
real.annotation: Complex two-way elevation antenna pattern

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyA/elevationAntennaPattern/RH
real.annotation: Complex two-way elevation antenna pattern

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyA/elevationAntennaPattern/RV
real.annotation: Complex two-way elevation antenna pattern

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyB/elevationAntennaPattern/zeroDopplerTime
real.annotation: Zero doppler time dimension corresponding to calibration elevationAntennaPattern records

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyB/elevationAntennaPattern/slantRange
real.annotation: Slant range dimension corresponding to calibration elevationAntennaPattern records

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyB/elevationAntennaPattern/HH
real.annotation: Complex two-way elevation antenna pattern

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyB/elevationAntennaPattern/HV
real.annotation: Complex two-way elevation antenna pattern

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyB/elevationAntennaPattern/VH
real.annotation: Complex two-way elevation antenna pattern

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyB/elevationAntennaPattern/VV
real.annotation: Complex two-way elevation antenna pattern

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyB/elevationAntennaPattern/RH
real.annotation: Complex two-way elevation antenna pattern

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyB/elevationAntennaPattern/RV
real.annotation: Complex two-way elevation antenna pattern

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyA/nes0/zeroDopplerTime
real.annotation: Zero doppler time dimension corresponding to calibration nes0 records

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyA/nes0/slantRange
real.annotation: Slant range dimension corresponding to calibration nes0 records

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyA/nes0/HH
real.annotation: Noise equivalent sigma zero

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyA/nes0/HV
real.annotation: Noise equivalent sigma zero

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyA/nes0/VH
real.annotation: Noise equivalent sigma zero

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyA/nes0/VV
real.annotation: Noise equivalent sigma zero

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyA/nes0/RH
real.annotation: Noise equivalent sigma zero

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyA/nes0/RV
real.annotation: Noise equivalent sigma zero

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyB/nes0/HH
real.annotation: Noise equivalent sigma zero

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyB/nes0/zeroDopplerTime
real.annotation: Zero doppler time dimension corresponding to calibration nes0 records

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyB/nes0/slantRange
real.annotation: Slant range dimension corresponding to calibration nes0 records

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyB/nes0/HV
real.annotation: Noise equivalent sigma zero

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyB/nes0/VH
real.annotation: Noise equivalent sigma zero

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyB/nes0/VV
real.annotation: Noise equivalent sigma zero

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyB/nes0/RH
real.annotation: Noise equivalent sigma zero

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyB/nes0/RV
real.annotation: Noise equivalent sigma zero

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/crosstalk/slantRange
real.annotation: Slant range dimension corresponding to crosstalk records

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/crosstalk/txHorizontalCrosspol
real.annotation: Crosstalk in H-transmit channel expressed as ratio txV / txH

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/crosstalk/txVerticalCrosspol
real.annotation: Crosstalk in V-transmit channel expressed as ratio txH / txV

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/crosstalk/rxHorizontalCrosspol
real.annotation: Crosstalk in H-receive channel expressed as ratio rxV / rxH

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/crosstalk/rxVerticalCrosspol
real.annotation: Crosstalk in V-recieve channel expressed as ratio rxH / rxV

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyA/commonDelay
real.annotation: Range delay correction applied to all polarimetric channels

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyA/faradayRotation
real.annotation: Faraday rotation correction applied in processing

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyA/HH/differentialDelay
real.annotation: Range delay correction applied to HH channel

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyA/HH/differentialPhase
real.annotation: Phase correction applied to HH channel

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyA/HH/scaleFactor
real.annotation: Scale factor applied to HH channel complex amplitude (at antenna boresite)

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyA/HH/scaleFactorSlope
real.annotation: Slope of scale factor applied to HH channel complex amplitude with respect to elevation angle

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyA/HV/differentialDelay
real.annotation: Range delay correction applied to HV channel

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyA/HV/differentialPhase
real.annotation: Phase correction applied to HV channel

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyA/HV/scaleFactor
real.annotation: Scale factor applied to HV channel complex amplitude (at antenna boresite)

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyA/HV/scaleFactorSlope
real.annotation: Slope of scale factor applied to HV channel complex amplitude with respect to elevation angle

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyA/VH/differentialDelay
real.annotation: Range delay correction applied to VH channel

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyA/VH/differentialPhase
real.annotation: Phase correction applied to VH channel

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyA/VH/scaleFactor
real.annotation: Scale factor applied to VH channel complex amplitude (at antenna boresite)

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyA/VH/scaleFactorSlope
real.annotation: Slope of scale factor applied to VH channel complex amplitude with respect to elevation angle

real.annotation: Range delay correction applied to VV channel

real.annotation: Phase correction applied to VV channel

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyA/VV/scaleFactor
real.annotation: Scale factor applied to VV channel complex amplitude (at antenna boresite)

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyA/VV/scaleFactorSlope
real.annotation: Slope of scale factor applied to VV channel complex amplitude with respect to elevation angle

real.annotation: Range delay correction applied to RH channel

real.annotation: Phase correction applied to RH channel

real.annotation: Scale factor applied to RH channel complex amplitude (at antenna boresite)

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyA/RH/scaleFactorSlope
real.annotation: Slope of scale factor applied to RH channel complex amplitude with respect to elevation angle

real.annotation: Range delay correction applied to RV channel

real.annotation: Phase correction applied to RV channel

real.annotation: Scale factor applied to RV channel complex amplitude (at antenna boresite)

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyA/RV/scaleFactorSlope
real.annotation: Slope of scale factor applied to RV channel complex amplitude with respect to elevation angle

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/azimuthChirpWeighting
real.annotation: 1-D array in frequency domain for azimuth processing. This is used for processing L0b to L1. FFT length=256 (assumed)

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/rangeChirpWeighting
real.annotation: 1-D array in frequency domain for range processing. This is used for processing L0b to L1. FFT length=256 (assumed)

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/referenceTerrainHeight
real.annotation: Reference Terrain Height as a function of time

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/zeroDopplerTime

real.annotation: Slant range dimension corresponding to processing information records

real.annotation: Zero doppler time dimension corresponding to processing information records

real.annotation: Slant range dimension corresponding to processing information records

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/frequencyB/zeroDopplerTime
real.annotation: Zero doppler time dimension corresponding to processing information records

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/orbit/time
real.annotation: Time vector record. This record contains the time corresponding to position and velocity records

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/orbit/position
real.annotation: Position vector record. This record contains the platform position data with respect to WGS84 G1762 reference frame

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/orbit/velocity
real.annotation: Velocity vector record. This record contains the platform velocity data with respect to WGS84 G1762 reference frame

string.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/orbit/orbitType
string.annotation: PrOE (or) NOE (or) MOE (or) POE (or) Custom

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/attitude/time
real.annotation: Time vector record. This record contains the time corresponding to attitude and quaternion records

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/attitude/quaternions
real.annotation: Attitude quaternions (q0, q1, q2, q3)

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/attitude/eulerAngles
real.annotation: Attitude Euler angles (roll, pitch, yaw)

string.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/attitude/attitudeType
string.annotation: PrOE (or) NOE (or) MOE (or) POE (or) Custom

string.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/runConfigurationContents
string.annotation: Contents of the run configuration file with parameters used for processing

string.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/processingInformation/algorithms/demInterpolation
string.annotation: DEM interpolation method

string.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/processingInformation/algorithms/rfiDetection
string.annotation: Algorithm used for radio frequency interference (RFI) detection

string.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/processingInformation/algorithms/rfiMitigation
string.annotation: Algorithm used for radio frequency interference (RFI) mitigation

string.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/processingInformation/algorithms/rangeCompression
string.annotation: Algorithm for focusing the data in the range direction

string.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/processingInformation/algorithms/elevationAntennaPatternCorrection
string.annotation: Algorithm for calibrating the antenna pattern

string.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/processingInformation/algorithms/rangeSpreadingLossCorrection
string.annotation: Algorithm for calibrating range fading

string.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/processingInformation/algorithms/dopplerCentroidEstimation
string.annotation: Algorithm for calculating Doppler centroid

string.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/processingInformation/algorithms/azimuthPresumming
string.annotation: Algorithm for regridding and filling gaps in the raw data in azimuth

string.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/processingInformation/algorithms/azimuthCompression
string.annotation: Algorithm for focusing the data in the azimuth direction

string.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/processingInformation/algorithms/softwareVersion
string.annotation: Software version used for processing

string.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/processingInformation/inputs/l0bGranules
string.annotation: List of input L0B products used

string.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/processingInformation/inputs/orbitFiles
string.annotation: List of input orbit files used

string.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/processingInformation/inputs/attitudeFiles
string.annotation: List of input attitude files used

string.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/processingInformation/inputs/auxcalFiles
string.annotation: List of input calibration files used

string.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/processingInformation/inputs/configFiles
string.annotation: List of input config files used

string.name: /science/LSAR/RSLC/metadata/processingInformation/inputs/demSource
string.annotation: Description of the input digital elevation model (DEM)
